what is the exam schedule: The exam schedule is published on the official college website under the 'Examinations' section.
who is the hod of cse: Dr. A. Sharma is the Head of the Computer Science Department.
what are the library timings: The library is open from 9 AM to 7 PM on weekdays.
how to contact the placement cell: You can reach out to placement@college.edu or visit the placement office near Block C.
what events are happening this month: Check the Events page on the college website for all upcoming activities.
